products.name: Green Giant Simply Steam Broccoli & Cheese Sauce

extendedInfo.detail: 60 calories per serving.  Contains a bioengineered food ingredient.  New look same great taste! Simply steam. Microwave right in bag. Must cook thoroughly - see cook instructions. Fits your lifestyle and your freezer. Green Giant Simply Steam vegetables are not only delicious, they come in freezer-friendly, easy-to-stack boxes, with a microwavable pouch inside.  No artificial flavors or preservatives. SmartLabel: Scan for more food information. Join the biggest veggie fans online. (at)GreenGiant. Facebook. Instagram. Twitter. Pinterest.  Questions or comments? 1-800-754-3381.
extendedInfo.ingredients: Broccoli, Water, Modified Corn Starch, Contains Less Than 2% Of Cheddar Cheese (Milk, Cheese Cultures, Salt, Enzymes), Parmesan Cheese (Pasteurized Milk, Cheese Cultures, Salt, Enzymes), Ricotta Cheese (Whey, Milkfat, Lactic Acid, Salt), Autolyzed Yeast Extract, Butter (Cream, Natural Flavor), Buttermilk, Dextrose, Garlic Powder, Hydrolyzed Corn Protein, Lactic Acid, Modified Whey, Natural Flavor, Onion Powder, Paprika And Annatto Extract (Color), Salt, Sodium Alginate, Sodium Phosphate, Sunflower Oil, Torula Yeast, Whey, Whey Protein Concentrate, Xanthan Gum, Yeast Extract.
extendedInfo.directions: Cooking Directions: For food safety and quality, follow the directions. Before eating, cook thoroughly to at least 165 degrees F. Keep frozen until ready to cook. Do not thaw. Adjust cook times and heat settings as needed. Refrigerate leftovers. Microwave (Recommended Method): 1. Remove pouch from carton. Place pouch, printed side up, on microwavable plate. Do not cut slit in pouch. 2. Microwave on high according to chart until thoroughly cooked. Microwave wattage (Wattage vary; adjust time for your microwave. Do not leave microwave unattended.): 1200; 4-1/2 to 6-1/2 min. time on high. Microwave wattage (Wattage vary; adjust time for your microwave. Do not leave microwave unattended.): 1000; 5-1/2 to 6-1/2 min. time on high. Microwave wattage (Wattage vary; adjust time for your microwave. Do not leave microwave unattended.): 700; 7 to 8 min. time on high. Let stand 1 minute. Caution: Hot! Pull or cut to open. Empty into serving dish; stir. Important: Do not heat pouch in boiling water. Stove-Top: 1. Empty contents of pouch into 2-quart nonstick saucepan. 2. Cover; cook over medium heat 10 to 17 minutes, breaking up and stirring occasionally. Important: Do not heat pouch in boiling water.  Great for a meal, side dish or snack-anytime.  Keep frozen.
